triples.name: Text corpus
triples.relevance: The ParlaMint corpora is a new collection of parliamentary text data that the paper presents as a major contribution.

triples.name: Universal Dependencies
triples.relevance: The paper applies Universal Dependencies linguistic annotation formalism to annotate the corpora.

triples.name: Named-entity recognition
triples.relevance: The paper uses named entity annotation to enrich the corpora with entity classification.

triples.name: GitHub
triples.relevance: GitHub is used as the platform to share the conversion scripts and samples of the corpora.

triples.name: Concordancer
triples.relevance: NoSketch Engine and KonText are concordancer tools used to explore and analyze the corpora.

triples.name: Corpus linguistics
triples.relevance: The paper applies corpus linguistics methodology to create uniformly encoded linguistic resources.

triples.name: Parliamentary procedure
triples.relevance: Parliamentary proceedings are the source material being documented and analyzed in the ParlaMint corpora.
